content.html: We did it!!! Groundbreaking news: Tidepool Loop receives FDA Clearance! This is the first ever fully interoperable automated insulin dosing app, cleared by the FDA that began as a patient-led initiative. Find the inside scoop here: tidepool.org/tidepool-loop
content.value:
We did it!!!

Groundbreaking news: Tidepool Loop receives FDA Clearance! 

This is the first ever fully interoperable automated insulin dosing app, cleared by the FDA that began as a patient-led initiative. Find the inside scoop here: tidepool.org/tidepool-loop
